item.title: Reinhardt Ability Overview | Overwatch

meta.summary:
b'Justice will be done: http://bit.ly/MeetReinhardt

One of Overwatchs first and finest agents, Reinhardt Wilhelm styles himself as a champion of a bygone age. Though Overwatch was eventually disbanded, Reinhardt was not content to sit idly by while the world fell to disorder. Donning his Crusader siege armor, he has vowed to fight for justice like a knight of old, defending the innocent and winning hearts and minds with the promise of better days to come.

With his powerful hammer, Reinhardt leads rocket-propelled charges across the battlefield. He wades into the fray, crushing enemies into walls, bringing combatants to their knees, and defending his allies with a massive energy shield.

Sign Up for Beta: http://bit.ly/JoinOverwatch 
Like Us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/playoverwatch 
Follow Us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/playoverwatch'

item.title: Overwatch: Counter the STUN Meta! - Reinhardt Advanced Guide

meta.summary:
b"Reinhardt is both perhaps the most frustrating hero to play right now but also surprising one of the strongest heroes. Deathball and brawling is the way to go, but you also can easily get knocked in the face and focused down if you're not careful. In today's advanced guide, we break down the more important things to think about when playing up against the stun meta and what your goals should be when taking engagements. It is possible to outplay the stun meta rather than let it rekt you, but you have to know what you're playing for and try to set up beneficial teamfights, rather than simply stand in front and hope your team wins a poke war, Reinhardt has a job and if done wrong you can easily lose every teamfight and be left unsure what's going afoul. If you enjoyed this video and found it useful to improve your Overwatch Gameplay, be sure to leave the video a like!

item.title: Mastering Reinhardt's Kit For Dummies

meta.summary:
b"Entire google doc script: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1BHy0fIYDEdlXiQ_FlGKTXuc49wIwLx2y7Rm2Il_sX6c/edit?usp=sharing

Drift0r's video about armour in Overwatch: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zn297sIlKQk&index=0&
[Didnt know YouTube removed annotations]

Starting this project over 2 months ago, not having a lot of time to dedicate to it as I've been doing practice with my team 6 days a week plus school, this video has been re-edited countless times, script has been completely redrafted twice and re-recorded due to getting a better quality mic. Looking back on it I think I will drift away from reading from a script, not 100% sure yet. I definitely want to help people through vod reviews and I'll most likely make a video explaining it. Also the opinion at the end is semi-rushed and I hope it didn't come across as I like the state he is currently in. If I look back to the first few seasons there was only 1 person who could stun a reinhardt besides another rein which was flashbang, which has counterplay to it. This made him feel strong and powerful in game, now there are so many abilities to displace rein he feels more like a punching bag than something to fear. I would really like some stun resistance or knock-back distance resistance as it would make him much more fun again. Anyways once again thanks for watching and I hope you learned something or enjoyed the video. Let me know if you are confused about anything or if I haven't addressed a certain thing.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Awesomeness_OW

Music Credits: [Not in particular order]
Kevin MacLeod - AcidJazz
Revolution Void - Someone Else's Memory
Komiku - Action Epic
Jahzzar - Please Listen Carefully
Jahzzar - Candy
Jahzzar- DJ
Broke For Free - Warm Up Suit
Dylan Tallchief - I tried making russian Hardbass [Sampled in outro]

Game: Overwatch Blizzard Entertainment
Sampled clip from The Overwatch League
Editing Software: Sony Vegas Pro 13
Recording Software: Geforce Experience (Shadowplay)
Recording Software [Mic]: Audacity
PC Specs: who cares"

item.title: Comprehensive Earthshatter Guide (Part 1 of 2) | Overwatch Advanced Reinhardt Guide

meta.summary:
b'Part 2 - how to defend against the enemy Reinhardt Earthshatter can be found here - https://youtu.be/PTIeowDaISE

b'----------------------------------------------------------------
This video was sponsored by Guilded. Find out more about the best Overwatch LFG around, plus a chance at a $50 Blizzard Card giveaway here: https://www.guilded.gg/JoeKingYT
----------------------------------------------------------------


Today we are back again trying a top 500 tip reinhardt video because I think its fun and people just love reinhardt it seems. Today we are talking about how the grandmaster reinhardt player can carry his competitive games in season 6 overwatch competitive ranked mode. Going over some reinhardt season 7 tips and guide or whatever you want to call it. thanks! 




More Videos! : https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLefC4eOMnbRF5Xm7uCjfU73bh0ybup9Df

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------






What is overwatch?: Well overwatch is Blizzards new take on the fps genre. In this game you choose a hero or "Class" to take on enemies, push payloads, and take control points. The point of the game is to beat the other team over and it is indeed a whole bunch of fun to play. The game includes 26 heroes so far and Is a blast to play. In this video I mostly go over playing it in a commentary type of manner, and these types of videos will usually be overwatch live commentaries or overwatch group commentaries. As well expect a few guides of this game in the future and some box openings as well. Anyways, hope you enjoy blizzards new hit!'

Who is JoeKing aka me. Im a overwatch youtuber that likes to talk about character updates, how to get better, and the competitive community. Trying to help you get better at overwatch and entertain at the same time hopefully.
